name: powerful
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: powerful
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having a lot of power to control people and events
trans_examp.trans_cn: 有权力的；有力量的；强大的

example.eg: The president is more powerful than the prime minister.
She's the most powerful person in the organization.
example.egtrans: 她是该组织中最有影响力的人。

dsense.name: powerful
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having a lot of strength or force

example.egtrans: 她是个非常矫健的赛跑运动员。

example.eg: The picture quality is bad because the TV signal isn't powerful enough.
example.egtrans: 图像效果不好，因为电视信号不强。

example.eg: Her speech about cruelty to children was very powerful.
example.egtrans: 她关于虐待儿童问题的发言很有感染力。

dsense.name: powerful
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having the power to increase the size of an image of something that is very small or far away many times
trans_examp.trans_cn: 高倍率的，高放大倍数的

example.eg: You'd need an extremely powerful microscope to see something so small.
example.egtrans: 看这么小的东西你需要超高倍显微镜。
